product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Red Creek +30 Sleeping Bag - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: With overlapping shingle construction and lightweight primeX synthetic insulation, this 3-season backpacking bag eliminates cold spots, compresses small and keeps you warm even when it's damp.
